skills.name: Teamwork
skills.body: Helps teammates when asked. Gives and takes credit when due. Collaborates to deliver high quality work. Builds stable relationships internally.

skills.name: Culture
skills.body: Understands and can articulate the principles and values of the team and organization.

skills.name: Mentoring & Learning
skills.body: Seeks out opportunities for mentorship and education to improve their craft.

skills.name: Influence
skills.body: Receives direction on tasks including their designs and technical acceptance criteria from their engineering lead.

skills.name: Teamwork
skills.body: Helps teammates when asked. Gives and takes credit when due. Collaborates to deliver high quality work. Builds stable relationships internally.

skills.name: Mentoring & Learning
skills.body: Seeks out opportunities for mentorship and education. Occasionally helps their teammembers in an open collaborative manner in accordance with cultural values.
